headline: NOVA O2 H2 PORTABLE GAS ANALYZER
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Nova
Model 341K
Description O2/H2 Portable Gas Analyzer
Other Information

For Measurement of O2 and H2 in Furnace Atmosphere Gases
Dual Range:
Readout Range One,0-1000 X 10 PPM O2
Readout Range Two,0-25% O2
Readout Range Three, 0-40% H2
Flow Rate: 1 LPM

Detection Method:
Oxygen by Customer Replaceable Electrochemical Sensor
Hydrogen by Temperature Compensated Thermal Conductivity Cell
Replaceable Electrochemical Sensor not supplied

15 VDC Charger
Digital Readout

Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.250 in (23.5 cm)
Depth 6.750 in (17.1 cm)
Height 6.500 in (16.5 cm)
Weight 7 lb (3 kg)
